item.title: 美国劳工委员会放弃对SpaceX的监管，马斯克获胜，彭博社报道
item.description: 彭博社周一援引美国劳工委员会的一封信函报道称，该委员会将放弃与埃隆·马斯克旗下SpaceX公司持续多年的法律诉讼，并表示未来将避免对该公司提起诉讼。【原文：The U.S. labor board is abandoning a years-long legal battle against Elon Musk's SpaceX and signaling it will steer clear of future cases against the company, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing a letter from the board.】

item.title: 交易日 高市与科技强心剂
item.description: 全球股市周一上涨，日本首相高市早苗大获全胜的选举结果以及科技股反弹提振了市场信心，而美元则因有报道称中国已建议金融机构限制持有美国债券而下跌。【原文：World stocks rallied on Monday, propelled by optimism around Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi's thumping election win and a rebound in tech, while the dollar slumped on reports that China has advised financial institutions to curb exposure to U.S. bonds.】

item.title: 字母表公司增发债券助推企业债券销售创纪录年预期
item.description: 谷歌母公司Alphabet周一进军美国高评级债券市场，进一步推动了人工智能企业债务融资的热潮。分析师预测，这将使今年企业债券发行规模创下历史新高。【原文：Google parent Alphabet tapped the U.S. high-grade bond market on Monday, adding to a boom in debt funding by AI companies that analysts project will lead to a record-breaking year for corporate debt issuance.】

item.title: 澳大利亚麦格理集团第三季度业绩强劲，各业务部门表现亮眼
item.description: 澳大利亚麦格理集团周二表示，得益于旗下各业务部门业绩的提升，其第三季度利润较去年同期实现增长。【原文：Australia's Macquarie Group said on Tuesday its third‑quarter profit rose from a year earlier, helped by stronger performance across its business divisions.】

item.title: 芯片制造商安森美季度营收未达预期，股价下跌
item.description: 芯片制造商安森美周一公布的第四季度营收未达华尔街预期，其业务板块下滑幅度高达17%，持续的库存过剩对其造成冲击。【原文：Chipmaker Onsemi missed Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter revenue on Monday, with its business segments declining as much as 17%, hurt by a persistent inventory glut.】

item.title: 辛辛那提金融公司季度利润因保费收入和投资收益增长而上升
item.description: 财产险和意外险公司辛辛那提金融集团周一公布的第四季度利润实现增长，反映出保费收入和投资收益的提升。【原文：Property and casualty insurer Cincinnati Financial's fourth-quarter profit rose on Monday, reflecting higher premiums and investment income.】

item.title: 主要广播公司与Newsmax将就全国所有权上限展开辩论
item.description: 据路透社获得的证词显示，代表广播电视机构的团体与保守派有线新闻频道Newsmax将于周二就一项规则的命运展开交锋。该规则禁止广播机构覆盖超过全美电视家庭总数的39%。【原文：A group representing broadcast television stations and conservative cable news channel Newsmax will square off Tuesday on the fate of rules that bar broadcasters from reaching more than 39% of the total number of U.S. TV households, according to testimony seen by Reuters.】

item.title: Waymo在纳什维尔实现全自动驾驶
item.description: 谷歌旗下自动驾驶公司Waymo周一宣布，其在田纳西州纳什维尔市的自动驾驶服务已实现完全无人驾驶，随着美国自动驾驶出租车竞争日趋激烈，该公司正加速推进运营规模。【原文：Alphabet unit Waymo said on Monday it has gone fully autonomous in Nashville, Tennessee, ramping up operations as the robotaxi race heats up in the United States.】

item.title: 据CNBC报道，塔吉特百货正增加门店员工数量，同时裁减约500个其他岗位。
item.description: 据美国全国广播公司财经频道周一援引内部备忘录报道，塔吉特百货正增加门店员工数量，但同时将裁减约500个配送中心和区域办公室岗位。【原文：Target is stepping up store staffing, but eliminating about 500 jobs in distribution centers and regional offices, CNBC reported on Monday, citing an internal memo.】

item.title: 美联储官员米兰表示美元走弱不会影响货币政策选择
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬·米兰周一表示，美元走弱目前对央行而言并非重大问题。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said Monday a weaker dollar isn’t much of an issue for the central bank right now.】

item.title: 美国农业部称，为防治螺虫，苍蝇生产工厂将于2027年底前投入运营。
item.description: 美国农业部部长布鲁克·罗林斯周一宣布，该部门将于明年年底前在得克萨斯州开设一座生产灭菌苍蝇的设施，用于防治食肉寄生虫新世界螺虫。【原文：The U.S. Department of Agriculture will open a facility in Texas by the end of next year that produces sterile flies intended to fight the flesh-eating parasite New World screwworm, Secretary Brooke Rollins said on Monday.】

item.title: 巴西雷森公司任命皮涅罗·内托律师事务所和克莱里·戈特利布律师事务所，力图扭转其经营困境
item.description: 巴西陷入困境的糖和乙醇生产商雷森公司已任命皮涅罗·内托律师事务所和克莱里·戈特利布律师事务所担任顾问，以增强其流动性，助力公司扭转经营困境。三位知情人士周一透露了这一消息。【原文：Brazil's Raizen , the beleaguered sugar and ethanol producer, has appointed law firms Pinheiro Neto and Cleary Gottlieb as advisors to strengthen its liquidity as it tries to turn its fortunes around, three people familiar with the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 检察官称，卡吉尔巴西码头的抗议者不应被强制驱离
item.description: 巴西联邦检察院下属机构上周末发表声明，谴责当局可能动用武力驱离亚马逊地区嘉吉公司港口码头周边的原住民抗议者。【原文：A branch of Brazil's federal public prosecutors' office has denounced the potential use of force to remove Indigenous protesters from the vicinities of a Cargill port terminal in the Amazon, according to a statement late last week.】

item.title: 彭博社报道，耐克旗下品牌匡威将裁员重组团队
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引内部备忘录报道，耐克旗下品牌匡威本周要求员工居家办公，这家运动服饰巨头正实施战略调整以重振销售增长。【原文：Nike-owned Converse brand's employees were instructed to work from home this week as the sportswear giant makes strategic changes to recapture sales growth, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing a memo.】

item.title: 备忘录显示，摩根士丹利重新聘请资深交易专家迈克尔·格莱姆斯
item.description: 据路透社获得的一份内部备忘录显示，摩根士丹利已重新聘请资深交易专家迈克尔·格莱姆斯担任投资银行部主席，此前他曾在美国政府任职。【原文：Morgan Stanley has brought back veteran dealmaker Michael Grimes as chairman of investment banking after his stint with the U.S. government, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 通用汽车从Lucid Motors挖角新任战略主管
item.description: 通用汽车已聘请电动汽车初创企业Lucid Motors的一位高管负责企业战略，该职位将包括寻求与科技公司的合作机会。【原文：General Motors has hired an executive from electric-vehicle startup Lucid Motors to lead corporate strategy, a role that will include scouting for partnerships with technology companies.】

item.title: 孟加拉国为部分使用美国材料制成的服装争取到19%的美国关税豁免
item.description: 孟加拉国临时领导人穆罕默德·尤努斯在X平台表示，根据两国周一签署的贸易协议，孟加拉国已获得美国19%的减让关税，该协议将豁免部分使用美国材料制造的纺织品和服装。【原文：Bangladesh has secured a reduced 19% U.S. tariff under a trade agreement signed between the two countries on Monday that would exempt some textiles and garments manufactured with U.S. material, interim leader Muhammad Yunus said on X.】

item.title: 《世界报》报道称，雷诺计划全面掌控电动货车合资企业Flexis
item.description: 法国《世界报》周一报道称，雷诺计划收购沃尔沃集团和航运公司达飞海运在电动货车合资企业Flexis所持股份。此前由于市场增长未达预期，该公司对业务计划进行了重新评估。【原文：Renault plans to buy out stakes held by Volvo Group and shipping firm CMA CGM in their electric van joint venture Flexis, French newspaper Le Monde reported on Monday, following a review of the business plan as market growth falls short of expectations.】

item.title: 白宫顾问哈塞特预计就业数据将有所下降
item.description: 白宫经济顾问凯文·哈塞特周一表示，由于人口数量减少和生产率提高，未来数月美国就业增长数据可能出现下滑。【原文：White House economic adviser Kevin Hassett said on Monday that Americans could see smaller job growth numbers in the coming months due to lower population figures and higher productivity.】

item.title: LVMH继承人阿尔诺晋升集团执行董事会
item.description: 路威酩轩集团继承人安托万·阿尔诺周一被提拔进入该奢侈品集团的执行委员会，与担任首席执行官的姐姐德尔菲娜共同进入公司最高决策机构。此举是首席执行官兼董事长伯纳德·阿尔诺对领导层进行重组的一部分。【原文：LVMH heir Antoine Arnault was promoted to the luxury group's executive committee on Monday, joining his sister Delphine in the company's top decision-making body as CEO and chairman Bernard Arnault reshuffles leadership roles.】

item.title: 大型IPO蓄势待发，华尔街预期今年将成为上市突破之年
item.description: 积压的新股上市需求以及包括埃隆·马斯克旗下SpaceX在内的一批备受瞩目的私营企业强劲的上市储备，正为美国首次公开募股市场可能迎来爆发性增长的一年奠定基础。【原文：Pent-up demand for new listings and a strong pipeline of high-profile private companies such as Elon Musk's SpaceX is setting the stage for what could be a breakout year for the U.S. initial public offering market.】

item.title: 谷歌因人工智能驱动的电影制作软件遭欧特克起诉
item.description: 谷歌因涉嫌侵犯欧特克公司"Flow"商标权而被起诉，该商标用于推广其用于制作电影、电视剧和电子游戏的竞争性人工智能软件。【原文：Google has been sued by Autodesk for allegedly infringing its "Flow" trademark to market competing AI-enabled software used to make movies, TV shows and video games.】

item.title: 法国央行行长离任不太可能改变欧洲央行的政策方向
item.description: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦·维勒鲁瓦·德加洛的意外辞职，不太可能改变欧洲央行的稳健政策方向——尤其在欧元区主要利率制定者罕见达成共识之际。【原文：The surprise resignation of Francois Villeroy de Galhau as French central bank governor is unlikely to change the European Central Bank's steady policy course at a time of rare unity among the euro zone's top rate setters.】

item.title: 研究表明，人工智能在为患者提供医疗建议方面并不优于其他方法
item.description: 《自然·医学》杂志发表的一项新研究表明，向人工智能咨询医疗症状，对患者做出更明智的健康决策的帮助并不比其他方法（如常规网络搜索）更大。【原文：Asking AI about medical symptoms does not help patients make better decisions about their health than other methods, such as a standard internet search, according to a new study published in Nature Medicine.】

item.title: 纽约联储调查：1月短期通胀预期走低，就业市场前景改善
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周一发布的报告称，美国民众对1月份通胀和就业形势的短期走势担忧有所减轻。【原文：Americans grew less worried about the near-term path of inflation and hiring in January, a report from the Federal Reserve Bank of New York said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国食品药品监督管理局称诺和诺德减肥药电视广告存在虚假或误导性内容
item.description: 美国食品药品监督管理局在2月5日的一封信函中指出，诺和诺德公司减肥药的电视广告存在"虚假或误导性"内容。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration said a television advertisement for Novo Nordisk's weight-loss pill is "false or misleading," according to a letter dated February 5.】

item.title: 独家：文件显示智利国家铜业公司2026年预算计划投资39亿美元
item.description: 智利国有矿业公司Codelco作为全球最大铜生产商，已批准总额39.14亿美元的投资计划。根据路透社查阅的一份未公开政府法令显示，该预算包含32.89亿美元本金及增值税。 在预算测算中，智矿公司预测2026年铜价将达每磅4.90美元，预计直接生产成本为每磅2202美元。上述数据此前未曾披露。【原文：Chilean state miner Codelco, the world's largest copper producer, authorized investments of $3.914 billion, made up of $3.289 billion plus Value Added Tax, according to an unpublished government decree approving its 2026 budget reviewed by Reuters. In calculating its budget, Codelco forecast a copper price of $4.90 per pound in 2026 and expects its direct production cost to be $2,202 per pound. These numbers have not been previously reported.】

item.title: Impactive Capital提名四名候选人加入金融科技公司WEX董事会
item.description: 激进投资者Impactive Capital周一宣布，已提名四名候选人角逐WEX公司即将召开的年度股东大会董事会席位，此举进一步加大了对这家金融科技公司的压力。【原文：Impactive Capital has nominated four candidates for election to the board of WEX at its upcoming annual shareholders' meeting, the activist investor said on Monday, ramping up pressure on the fintech company.】

item.title: 加拿大航空暂停飞往古巴航班，因该岛即将耗尽航空燃油
item.description: 加拿大航空公司周一宣布暂停飞往古巴的航班，此前古巴警告称其航空燃油即将耗尽。随着美国加强对这个共产主义国家石油供应的控制，古巴面临燃油短缺的困境。【原文：Air Canada said on Monday it is suspending flights to Cuba, which warned it was running out of jet fuel, as the U.S. tightens its grip on the communist-run nation's oil supply.】

item.title: 据CNBC报道，Databricks在50亿美元融资中估值达1340亿美元
item.description: 据美国全国广播公司财经频道周一报道，Databricks公司最新一轮融资额达50亿美元，公司估值达1340亿美元。【原文：Databricks completed its latest funding round of $5 billion, at a valuation of $134 billion, CNBC reported on Monday.】
